title: Play Button Always Grayed Out
body:
In the past 4 days I've noticed that almost every time I log into the game I am unable to play because the 'Play' button is grayed out. I've tried relogging multiple times and usually takes anywhere from 5 - 10 tries before I'm able to click play. I've tried using alternate accounts and receive the same result. The client resolution settings also get reverted back to the smallest size a few times during the log in 'ritual' I have now. 
In addition to the log in problem, I get a grayed out play button after canceling a normal draft pick queue.
http://imgur.com/a/Z60N9

replies.body:
1. Go to control panel
2. Change "view by" to "Small Icons"
3. Open "Internet Options"
4. Go to Advanced tab
5. Click the Reset button (for IE settings) and click reset on the pop-up window
5.1 If that doesn't work try again but this time check the "Delete personal settings" box.

That worked for me!
Not sure Yet but it seems that worked for me. Thanks

There is no "view by" in the Control Panel on Windows 10. Not on my PC. I even put it in the search bar, nothing specifically called "view by".

Screenshots:
http://prntscr.com/ey3zw6
http://prntscr.com/ey3ztl - searched for it, still nothing

And I checked 'Display' too, still nothing called "view by". And I haven't found a "Small icons" option yet.

Could you please be more specific (if possible), or send screenshots or something?
top right lul
I was looking for an icon  -_-"
Thank you. It finally works!
Can confirm this works. Thanks!!
Patch 9.24 the issue is still there, and this still works. Amazing.
patch 9.6 - bug still exists, this solution still works
Thank you so, so much!!!
thx a lot

I am also having the same issue however I tried to reopen the League application then it required an update but I'm already up to date with the current patch (7.1). This has happened to me multiple times since Friday (Usually after a game).

haveing same problem.... patch 7.1

This has happened to me as well. It will be available for a small period of time after restarting the client. The client also rolls back to previous updates after every restart. I now have the Christmas login screen again.
Same Issue, restart client and after a while it grays out, started happening since last patch as well.

I had to flush my dns:

Flush your DNS

Your system keeps a record of IP addresses and domain names for the servers you access. Sometimes it helps to clear old data from this cache and start fresh. It's extra important to try this if you've had any problems with your hard drive or if you have had a virus or malware infection on your PC.

NOTE: Complete these steps using an admin account. You will be typing prompts into the CMD console, so it is very important that you enter the commands exactly as shown.

The following steps are specific to PC users. Apple has instructions on resetting your DNS cache for Mac.

Windows 10

    Hold down the Windows Key and press X.
    Click Command Prompt (Admin).
    When the command prompt opens, type ipconfig/flushdns and press Enter.
    Type ipconfig /registerdns and press Enter.
    Type ipconfig /release and press Enter.
    Type ipconfig /renew and press Enter.
    Type netsh winsock reset and press Enter.
    Reboot your computer.

Worked for me. Good Luck!

Go to Network and Sharing Center > Local Area Connections > Properties > Internet protocol v4 > Select Use the following DNS server adresses and type 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4 on boxes below. > Ok > Close.

It worked for me.{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
Guys i'm 7.2 rn and it keeps happening please help.
Me too!! Somebody help!!

Thank you for reporting the issue. We're actively trying to get to the bottom of this bug but have not been able to reproduce it or get logs. It would be a huge help if you could send us your logs!

Steps 
1. Download the Hextech Tool: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool
2. Install the tool.
3. When you see the play button grey out in the client, proceed to step 4.
4. Run the Hextech Tool and uncheck "Add firewall Exceptions (Enables firewall).
5. Press "Start".
6. Wait for the tool to finish collecting your logs. The tool will notify you that is has finished with a pop up saying "All Done". 
7. Go to your desktop and locate "LoL Logs"
8. Send the "LoL Logs.zip" file to patcherlogs@riotgames.com

Thanks again for your help!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Every time I start a new game the play button is grey and I can't play the game it takes three to four minutes for the play button to come back

Same thing for me as well. I know that when I log in, immediately on login it's grey. Last night it was intermittent, and if I logged out & back in it would resolve itself. 

Today, I gave the client a few minutes between logins and browsed around the client itself waiting for the play button to light up, but it remained greyed out. 

Interesting to note as well, I was browsing skins, looking for chromas (I couldn't find them, BTW), and I noticed the skins said that they had "not been applied" yet. This was on all of my owned skins. I don't know if it's related, but it's something that's been happening lately as well. 

Anyone else having these issues?
